display_long_description:
# Save the galaxy from space pirates - now with even more Tumai!

Welcome, Agents, to **Hidden Pictures: Agent Q**, a puzzle-tastic space adventure that comes to life in your home! As an elite B.A.R.D. agent, your task is to stop the notorious Tumai, a band of space pirates, from stealing precious Galaxy Orbs.

Use your powers of deduction to solve the riddles and talk to the locals, known as Muddles, to get clues! And now, with the launch of a FREE DLC pack, you can meet even more Muddles, solve new puzzles and take on more of the invading Tumai force!

**Hidden Pictures: Agent Q** now includes more than 80 unique maps with themes from Museum, Western, Megacity and Halloween! 

[media]
Even more puzzles await in **Hidden Pictures: Agent Q** with three brand new puzzle types now included!
[media]
Think you’ve found every Tumai? Think again! 12 new pirates are hidden away for you to catch!
[media]
If you think you’ve seen all **Hidden Pictures: Agent Q** has to offer, it’s time to check out the brand new Hard difficulty levels for an exciting new challenge!

**Hidden Pictures: Agent Q** is an exciting puzzle game for all ages:
- Explore 80+ fun-sized worlds
- Discover hidden items and collectables
- Solve colorful timed puzzles
- Complete rhythm challenges
- Uncover hidden Tumai pirates 
- Complete Tumai and Muddle collections
- Take on the brand new Hard difficulty challenge!
